name: 只管战斗 Unorthodox game
description:
You just fight, the rest is left to luck.

You may be able to reach the top of your life by gaining two pieces of powerful equipment in the first game, confidently challenging powerful bosses and bursting out graduation equipment.
Or maybe in N games looking at each game of different ragged equipment and angrily uninstalling the game.
There is no need to consider complex collocations, the face is good every game is a powerful equipment, God blocks and kills God and Buddha blocks and kills Buddha! Awesome weapons explode like crazy!
The face is black every game is tattered equipment, and everyone who wants to cry without tears is afraid of QAQ

Six qualities, hundreds of pieces of equipment with different effects, some of which can even be combined as a set. Dozens of weapons with varying abilities.

There is almost no plot, so you "Just Fight"
